name: Jason vs Zombies 2
description:
This is the second part of the retro feeling game "Jason vs Zombies" here in the AppStore.

A cool creepy zombie shooter slaying game with a total of 11 weapons like chainsaw, sniper, machete etc.

Jason you have to kill more Zombies on this world.

You play a guy named Jason. There exists no humanity on this world.
The world is full of zombies and you (Jason) are the only man who can save the world if you find and kill all zombies.

Have fun with Jason.

NOTE: You are optionally able to share zombie content from this app to your facebook friends and timeline to get free weapon actions
